title: Blood Red
description: Aedan, a whoreslave used to reward victorious gladiators, has spent his whole life trying to hide his untrained gift of sorcery. When the new gladiator brought to the arena proves to be a beastman captive with magic of his own, Aedan's secret is put in jeopardy â€“ as is his life.Complete, approx. 125,713 words
author: Cordelia Kingsbridge
